page.title: 04LOCAL ISSUES, DIDSBURY
page.content: One of the issues local people in Didsbury, Withington and Burnage feel strongly about is education. A few years ago Manchester wanted to close its school sixth forms and set up sixth form colleges instead,but the Secretary of State for Education said that certain schools (two of which are in our area), should retain their sixth forms. Manchester is now attempting to reorganise to a tertiary system and the school sixth forms are again at risk. There is substantial disagreement surrounding these plans.
